mainText: I'm too young to be able to say that I've seen Steve Jobs progress to where he is today, but I remember being four years old and playing inside the box that my dad's iMac came in. From that computer, to the one I'm in front of now, looking at my Mac, all I can think about is how Steve Jobs was so important in making Apple what it is today. Hearing he died was so upsetting. I saw a tweet that said it perfectly, "People like Steve Jobs are supposed to live forever". In a way, I think he will. He will live on through Apple.
author: Julia
